LanguageData.TiberiumGreen.label: Green Tiberium
LanguageData.TiberiumGreen.description: A glowy green crystal. Looks strangely appealing. Beware of interaction.
LanguageData.TiberiumBlue.label: Blue Tiberium
LanguageData.TiberiumBlue.description: A glowy blue crystal. Beautiful to the eye but of unknown properties.
LanguageData.TiberiumRed.label: red Tiberium
LanguageData.TiberiumRed.description: A glowy red crystal. Beautiful to the eye but of unknown properties. Unusual.
LanguageData.TiberiumGlacier.label: Tiberium glacier
LanguageData.TiberiumVein.label: Vein
LanguageData.TiberiumVein.description: A stringy, throbbing brown-reddish vein. It grows out of a veinhole.
LanguageData.TiberiumGreenDesert.label: Green Tiberium shards
LanguageData.TiberiumGreenDesert.description: It seems like these crystals only spread in shards.
LanguageData.TiberiumBlueDesert.label: Blue Tiberium shards
LanguageData.TiberiumBlueDesert.description: It seems like these crystals only spread in shards.
LanguageData.TiberiumRedDesert.label: Red Tiberium shards
LanguageData.TiberiumRedDesert.description: It seems like these crystals only spread in shards.
